comment: What a great teacher! She is very interesting, very knowledgeable about the subject and she truly cares about what she's doing. This class was well worth it, I would recommend it to anyone. Dr. Ward is the perfect example of what a teacher should be.
amazing professor! lots of fun! go to class, listen, take notes, read them a little before tests and you will totally get a B.
AMAZING! Very interesting woman! go to class, listen and take notes and if you find her interesting you probably won't need to study to make Bs. She is very funny too!
Easy and interesting class.  The professor is an extremely interesting person!  She's been to a lot of places and done a lot of cool things.  Show up, take notes, and study and you should do fine.
Very easy A. go to class and take notes. She does not use textbook so do not buy it

AWESOME! make sure to read the readings for the tests and you'll do fine. she's more than willing to help and is extremely nice. gives bonus points for things like her birthday! has a passion for the subject and really knows her stuff. also has great stories about her research projects.
Take this class! It will change your life.

Excellent class, attendance is important even she does not call row, take notes of everything She say. Tests are quite complicated... because you have to think as  an anthropologist... so keep you mind open. I learned a lot,this class goes beyond the book.
She is so nice. Talk in class bc she will help you out in the end if you need it. Tests are straight from powerpoints and reading. DO THE READINGS. you should probably go to class to make an A
AMAZING!!!! took her 3 times...best prof. in my collegiate career!! she will make you think, make the material interesting, and enrich you life! highly recommended!!

SHE IS SO GREAT!!! Attendance is not necessarily required but her tests come straight from her overhead notes (when aren't posted online) so I reccomend you go. However, you won't mind going! She makes class fun and interesting with her stories. There were 4 tests which were all very easy if you study a little and do the readings!

She was an amazing teacher. I'd definitely recommend her if you want an easy A. She doesn't post notes only, so you have to go to class; however, she makes class interesting & is always telling stories of her fieldwork. I really enjoyed taking this class.
Great teacher.  DOES NOT GIVE TESTS!!!  Just go to class, do the simple weekly assignments, and the two projects...and you get an A!  She makes the class interesting.

LOVED HER!  She is so cute!  Had so much energy and made the class fun.  Readings are really interesting and gave a bunch of extra credit points.  But you have to go to class.  Such a shame that she's part time.  She made me want to be an athropologist but ksu doesn't have that major.  TAKE HER!
LOVED HER LOVED HER LOVED HER SHE WAS GREAT THE BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD IN COLLEGE SHE WAS HONESTLY VERY EXCITING AND I ALWAYS LOOKED FORWARD TO ATTENDING HER CLASS :)

One of my most enjoyable teachers. A post modernist at heart. The lady is a great teacher through her experiences, and is VERY interesting. Her class makes use of creativity, so we get to use our brain in different ways other than regurgitation. This marathon runner will be worth your while.
Humorous.  Very knowledgeable about the subject she teachers.  Overall, she makes what could easily be a boring subject fun.
Very animated, she makes lectures fun.  Her energy and excitment really drew me into the class.  Tests aren't super easy, but you'll be okay if you study.  Very interesting class.
